title: Stylish Huailai Stay with Water Park near Great Wall
description: A serene oasis with rolling green lawns, Crowne Plaza Huailai, an IHG Hotel is a refined basecamp perfectly situated to access thrilling experiences in the heart of Beijing's Huailai region. Visit the Kangxi Grassland racetrack, shred the slopes at Badaling Ski Resort, go on safari at Badaling Wildlife World, or encounter the incredible Great Wall. Staying in? Entertain yourself at the hotel's water park before savouring Cantonese cuisine at the onsite restaurant.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Huailai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Grape Avenue, Donghuayuan Town, Huailai, Zhangjiakou 075400, China

title: China: Chongli Ski Resort Stay in the Home of the 2022 Winter Olympics
description: Leave the urban grind behind for a winter wonderland at Holiday Inn Resort Zhangjiakou Chongli, an IHG Hotel. Adjacent to the Fulong Snow Park ski resort, you could be kicking up powdered snow in minutes or enjoying soaring over the slopes. After a day of skiing, hiking and exploration, heat up with some spicy Sichuan cuisine at Garden Chinese Restaurant before admiring the panoramic views over a sweet treat or a warming tea at the Lobby Lounge.
location_description: Holiday Inn Resort Zhangjiakou Chongli, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: No. 3 Wanlong Road, Chongli, Zhangjiakou, HE 076350, China
